promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic monkey steel-type pokemon holding a metallic club. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cudgelith, a a chibi cute basic monkey steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Extra Chop. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "monkey", "steel" or "Cudgelith". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, monkey-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: This petite primate, Cudgelith, dwells in arid regions, skillfully utilizing its unrivaled metallic strength to perform a powerful Extra Chop.
